text: Worden is an unincorporated community in Douglas County, Kansas, United States. It is seven miles west of Baldwin City and nine miles east of Overbrook. It is along U.S. Highway 56. ==History== Worden had a post office from 1884 until 1904. The abandoned SM-65 Atlas-E missile site 548â€“2 is about 1.9 miles southwest of Worden. Until 2011, USD 348 in Baldwin maintained the Marion Springs Elementary School. That school was in Worden. ==References== ==Other websites== * Douglas County Maps: Current , Historic , KDOT Category:Unincorporated communities in Douglas County, Kansas
title: Worden, Kansas
